mobile.name: Puff dragon fractal
mobile.long_description: Puff the Fractal Dragon is here, contemplating a higher reality.
mobile.description: Is that some type of differential curve involving some strange, and unknown calculus that she seems to be made out of?

mobile.name: clone
mobile.long_description: A boring old clone is standing here.
mobile.description: This clone is nothing to look at. No, really, it is quite boring.

mobile.name: zombie undead humanoid
mobile.long_description: A strange humanoid is here. How odd, its flesh seems to be falling off!
mobile.description: This strange humanoid is moving rather slowly, and appears to be a corpse, a walking corpse! It must be a zombie or something of the sort.

mobile.name: aerial servant shape
mobile.long_description: An amorphous shape is floating in the air.
mobile.description: As you stare at this amorphous shape, it begins to appear to take the shape of a cloud-like humanoid.

mobile.name: elemental
mobile.long_description: An elemental is standing patiently here.
mobile.description: This creature is the essence of the elements, and appears to be waiting patiently for something to occur.
